affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target, Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/115/130/145
COOLDOWN: 8.50
desc: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.
notes: Dragon Slave can hit units up to 1225 units away.
lore: In the scorched barren of Misrule, Lina learned to manipulate the fiery breath of the Desert Wyrm as a form of entertainment.
name: lina_dragon_slave

attrib:
RADIUS: 225
CAST DELAY: 0.5
STUN DURATION: 1.6 / 1.9 / 2.2 / 2.5
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/110/120/130
COOLDOWN: 7
desc: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.
notes: Light Strike Array will destroy trees in its area of effect.
lore: Lina's essence allows her to focus the sun's energies, causing air to combust at will.
name: lina_light_strike_array

attrib:
ATTACK SPEED BONUS: 40 / 55 / 70 / 85
MOVE SPEED BONUS: 5% / 6% / 7% / 8%
MAX STACKS: 3
desc: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts 10 seconds.
notes:
Duration refreshes each time a new spell is cast.
Using items does not trigger Fiery Soul.
lore: Dancing flames embody Lina's playful nature, bringing out her true blazing self.
name: lina_fiery_soul

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
SCEPTER DAMAGE: Pure
cmb:
MANA COST: 280/420/680
COOLDOWN: 70/60/50
desc:
Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.
Upgradable with Aghanim's Scepter.
notes: Laguna Blade has a 0.25 delay before the damage is applied after the spell is cast, allowing certain abilities to avoid the damage.Aghanim's Scepter Laguna Blade damage goes through magic immunity. Even with Aghanim's Scepter, damage from Laguna Blade can be reduced by magic resistance.
lore: The air around Lina becomes so intensely torrid that it scorches a foe that comes too close with white-hot lightning.
name: lina_laguna_blade
